title: Supermarket wordmark typeface
content:
Can anyone help to ID the font used in supermarket Carulla wordmark, please?  
JPEG supplied in the link below

Many thanks

Font: 

 Probably Apricot or Romany 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064113/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [wordmark.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064113/http:/typophile.com/files/wordmark.gif) | 4.71 KB |
author: DumbType

comments.content: Can't state if it's hand-drawn or partially customized (part of the obvious 'll' ligature) but can't find any match for this one (but some other will do). Only one alternative needing some little tweaking: [Apricot](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317064113/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/apricot)

Thanks to both of you, Ryuk and donshottype.

Yes, it surely has been customized from the font(s) you mention.

Thanks again.
